name: trackmy
description: A webapp for displaying room occupancy

scripts.init-install: npm install && ./backend/secrets/create.sh && npm run docker-install && npm run front-install && npm run back-install
scripts.uninstall: npm run docker-uninstall && npm run front-uninstall
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run docker-start" "npm run front-start"  "npm run back-start"
scripts.docker-uninstall: cd backend/db && docker-compose down && docker rmi trackmy-db
